## Setup

```{r}
####### summary data #######
summary_data_loc <- paste0(working_directory, "data/aggregate.csv")
summary_data <- read.csv(summary_data_loc, na.strings="NONE")

summary_data$DISABLE_REACTION_SENSORS <- as.factor(summary_data$DISABLE_REACTION_SENSORS)
summary_data$chg_env <- summary_data$chg_env == "True"
summary_data$dominant_plastic_odd_even <- as.factor(summary_data$dominant_plastic_odd_even)
summary_data$sensors <- summary_data$DISABLE_REACTION_SENSORS == "0"
summary_data$is_plastic <- summary_data$dominant_plastic_odd_even == "True"
summary_data$extra_task_value <- as.factor(summary_data$extra_task_value)

env_label_fun <- function(chg_env) {
  if (chg_env) {
    return("Fluctuating")
  } else {
    return("Constant")
  }
}

sensors_label_fun <- function(has_sensors) {
  if (has_sensors) {
    return("Sensors")
  } else {
    return("No sensors")
  }
}

condition_label_fun <- function(has_sensors, env_chg) {
  if (has_sensors && env_chg) {
    return("Plastic (fluctuating)")
  } else if (env_chg) {
    return("Non-plastic (fluctuating)")
  } else {
    return("Non-plastic (constant)")
  }
}

summary_data$env_label <- mapply(
  env_label_fun,
  summary_data$chg_env
)
summary_data$sensors_label <- mapply(
  sensors_label_fun,
  summary_data$sensors
)
summary_data$condition <- mapply(
  condition_label_fun,
  summary_data$sensors,
  summary_data$chg_env
)

condition_order = c(
  "Non-plastic (constant)",
  "Non-plastic (fluctuating)",
  "Plastic (fluctuating)"
)

###### time series #####
# TODO

####### misc #######
# Configure our default graphing theme
theme_set(theme_cowplot())
```

## Evolution of phenotypic plasticity

For sensor-enabled populations in fluctuating environments, we only transfered populations containing an optimally plastic genotype to phase-two.

```{r}
summary_data_grouped = dplyr::group_by(summary_data, sensors, env_label, condition, extra_task_value)
summary_data_group_counts = dplyr::summarize(summary_data_grouped, n=dplyr::n())

ggplot(summary_data_group_counts, aes(x=condition, y=n, fill=condition)) +
  geom_col(position=position_dodge(0.9)) +
  geom_text(aes(label=n, y=n+2)) +
  scale_x_discrete(
    name="Condition",
    limits=condition_order
  ) +
  ylab("Number of replicates in phase two") +
  facet_wrap(~extra_task_value, labeller=label_both) +
  theme(
    legend.position="none"
  )
```

We can confirm our expectation that the dominant genotypes in non-plastic conditions are not phenotypically plastic.

```{r}
summary_data_grouped = dplyr::group_by(summary_data, condition, is_plastic, extra_task_value)
summary_data_group_counts = dplyr::summarize(summary_data_grouped, n=dplyr::n())
ggplot(filter(summary_data_group_counts, is_plastic), aes(x=condition, y=n, fill=condition)) +
  geom_col(position=position_dodge(0.9)) +
  scale_x_discrete(
    name="Condition",
    limits=condition_order
  ) +
  geom_text(aes(label=n, y=n+1)) +
  ylab("Number of replicates with a plastic dominant genotype") +
  facet_wrap(~extra_task_value, labeller=label_both) +
  theme(
    legend.position="none"
  )
```

## Extra task performance at the end of the experiment (population)

```{r}

final_performed_data <- pivot_longer(
  summary_data,
  cols=starts_with("final_pop_extra_tasks_"),
  names_prefix="final_pop_extra_tasks_",
  names_to="final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold",
  values_to="final_pop_extra_tasks"
)


ggplot(filter(final_performed_data, extra_task_value=="0" & final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold=="0.05"), aes(x=condition, y=final_pop_extra_tasks, fill=condition)) +
  geom_flat_violin(
    position = position_nudge(x = .2, y = 0),
    alpha = .8
  ) +
  geom_point(
    mapping=aes(color=condition),
    position = position_jitter(width = .15),
    size = .5,
    alpha = 0.8
  ) +
  geom_boxplot(
    width = .1,
    outlier.shape = NA,
    alpha = 0.5
  ) +
  scale_x_discrete(
    name="Condition",
    limits=condition_order
  ) +
  ylab("Extra tasks performed in final population") +
  facet_grid(
    final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold~extra_task_value,
    labeller=labeller(.cols=label_both, .rows=label_value)
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position="none"
  )



pop_threshold <- "0.05"
final_performed_data_v0 <- filter(final_performed_data, extra_task_value=="0" & final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold==pop_threshold)
ggplot(final_performed_data_v0, aes(x=condition, y=final_pop_extra_tasks, color=condition)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.25) +
  facet_grid(
    final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold~extra_task_value,
    labeller=labeller(.cols=label_both, .rows=label_value)
  )
kruskal.test(
  formula=final_pop_extra_tasks~condition,
  data=final_performed_data_v0
)
pairwise.wilcox.test(
  x=final_performed_data_v0$final_pop_extra_tasks,
  g=final_performed_data_v0$condition,
  p.adjust.method="bonferroni",
  conf.int=TRUE,
  conf.level=0.95
)

final_performed_data_v03 <- filter(final_performed_data, extra_task_value=="0.03" & final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold==pop_threshold)
ggplot(final_performed_data_v03, aes(x=condition, y=final_pop_extra_tasks, color=condition)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.25) +
  facet_grid(
    final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold~extra_task_value,
    labeller=labeller(.cols=label_both, .rows=label_value)
  )
kruskal.test(
  formula=final_pop_extra_tasks~condition,
  data=final_performed_data_v03
)
pairwise.wilcox.test(
  x=final_performed_data_v03$final_pop_extra_tasks,
  g=final_performed_data_v03$condition,
  p.adjust.method="bonferroni",
  conf.int=TRUE,
  conf.level=0.95
)

final_performed_data_v10 <- filter(final_performed_data, extra_task_value=="0.1" & final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold==pop_threshold)
ggplot(final_performed_data_v10, aes(x=condition, y=final_pop_extra_tasks, color=condition)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.25) +
  facet_grid(
    final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold~extra_task_value,
    labeller=labeller(.cols=label_both, .rows=label_value)
  )
kruskal.test(
  formula=final_pop_extra_tasks~condition,
  data=final_performed_data_v10
)
pairwise.wilcox.test(
  x=final_performed_data_v10$final_pop_extra_tasks,
  g=final_performed_data_v10$condition,
  p.adjust.method="bonferroni",
  conf.int=TRUE,
  conf.level=0.95
)

final_performed_data_v30 <- filter(final_performed_data, extra_task_value=="0.3" & final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold==pop_threshold)
ggplot(final_performed_data_v30, aes(x=condition, y=final_pop_extra_tasks, color=condition)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.25) +
  facet_grid(
    final_pop_extra_tasks_threshold~extra_task_value,
    labeller=labeller(.cols=label_both, .rows=label_value)
  )
kruskal.test(
  formula=final_pop_extra_tasks~condition,
  data=final_performed_data_v30
)
pairwise.wilcox.test(
  x=final_performed_data_v30$final_pop_extra_tasks,
  g=final_performed_data_v30$condition,
  p.adjust.method="bonferroni",
  conf.int=TRUE,
  conf.level=0.95
)
```

## Extra task discovery

```{r}
discovery_data <- pivot_longer(

)
```

## Extra task performance over time
